item.title: Multiple-protocol with aria2
item.description: People at TecMint wrote great posts and gatherhui tons of tips about Linux. Recently, they twitted about aria2: Aria2 â€“ A Multi-Protocol Command-Line #Download Tool for #Linux https://t.co/u7GM9Sgozu via @tecmint RT @linuxtoday pic.twitter.com/1GMGKHOEYA — Linux Inside: The Ideal Blog for Sysadmins & Geeks (@tecmint) April 29, 2019 I gave it a try, and it’s pretty sweet ðŸ˜„! With a simple command line, you can download any file using any of the most common transfer protocols!
